dialogues.text: The Cultists SCREAM in sympathy, letting out years of repressed frustration.  Many of them are dancing on the shards of glass now, crazed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry's car is parked a quarter mile from Nix's house. He getting out.  Swann stays put.  The SOUND of SCREAMING is carried towards them on the win

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (spooked)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus... what the hell's going on in there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At a guess... they just resurrected him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck. Harry starts towards the house. After a beat, Swann gets of the car and follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On Butterfield, as Nix removes his foot.  Butterfield is for the count.  On Nix, as he stops screaming.  His face is grotesquely disfigured by the mask, the flesh stained and corrupted.  The SCREAMING of the Cultists is dying away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Children...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Cultists all face the Sanctum door, awaiting instruct

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you suffer to come unto me? One by one, the Cultists fall to their knees.  We never s flesh pierced by broken glass.  But we HEAR IT, and see t agony on the Cultist's faces.  They start to sob. Then, Nix appears in the doorway, mostly hidden by shadow

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've come back to share the wisdom of the grave.  Will you hear it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes... yes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Follow me then. He steps out of the doorway.  The Cultists let out sobs o adoration.  Nix locks at Dorothea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do I know you, child? He reaches for her.  Pulls her close to his body. Dorothe keeps her self-possession; but only just.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yes... I do, don't I?  No gun this time, child? (a beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Swann?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know where he is. Nix picks her up, so that her feet are inches off the gro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He'll come.  We've got unfinished business, he and I. Then he carries her down the passageway to the Meditation Room, walking on the glass, apparently indifferent to the wounds he's receiving.  The Cultists follow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nix strides into the middle of the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispered to Dorothea)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something terrible's going to happen.  But if you hold on to me, very tight, you may live a little longer. The Cultists enter the room, knees and hands BLOODY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Cultists)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you ready for my wisdom?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell us... tell us...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry pushes open the window, and climbs in.  Swann follo He is frozen by the memory of what happened here.  ON SWANN, as the TRACK fills with eerie ECHOES of that terrible event.  Nix's SCREAMS.  The GUN-SHOTS.  The soun the SCREWS GRINDING into Nix's flesh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in terrified awe)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is where we killed him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking at table)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You didn't try hard enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't... I can't go any further... Harry nods, and gently detaches his arm from Swann's pani grip.  He crosses to the door.  Suddenly. Butterfield reaches out of the darkness, and catches hold of Harry's leg. throwing him to the ground.  He has one of the INSTRUMENTS in his hand.  He STABS at Harry, striking the ground between Harry's legs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here is my wisdom. He stamps on the ground.  CRACKS spread from his foot in directions. ON THE CULTISTS, amazed by this manifestation power.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Show us. Puritan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, show us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Show us!  Show us! With a ROAR, a PIT four or five feet across opens up bene Nix and Dorothea.  Nix HOVERS over it.  It's utterly dark perhaps bottomless.  Dorothea SCREAMS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hearing Dorothea's CRY, Harry looks back towards the passageway.  Butterfield pulls the instrument out of the ground and stabs at Harry a second time.  But Swann catch hold of his arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Harry)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever he's doing to her, stop him! And Harry's up and away --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- he dashes over the glass --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On Nix, Dorothea clasped close to him.  He REVOLVES as he floats over the chasm below then.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to unseen Cultists)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see, I escaped the grave. So I have to give something to the grave in return. On the Cultists, listening to their lord with love in the eyes.  A SLIT OPENS in the middle of Nix's forehead, above the bridge of his nose (this is an image we saw in the prints the library), and from it comes a WAVE OF DARKNESS.  As N REVOLVES, the darkness STRIKES the GROUND around the Cultists. At first they don't realize what's going on.  They think is some kind of bizarre blessing.  Then the ground starts to LIQUIFY beneath them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's happening?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to give something back. So I'm giving you. They're starting to SCREAM now as they sink into the grou They struggle, of course, but the earth seems to be hungr for them.  They are dragged down, THRASHING as they SINK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sobbing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?  Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not worthy.  None of you.  Only Swann was worthy. You just waited like lambs. Harry appears in the doorway.  Nix, still swinging round, his back to Harry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well I'm not your shepherd. Harry surveys the horrific scene in front of him.  The gr is now re-solidifying around the Cultists, some of whom h disappeared from view completely, some of whom still reac out of the dirt.  The scene has a surreal beauty to it despite its horror.  SCREAMING FACES locked in the solid ground.  TWITCHING HANDS the same. Harry starts towards N and Dorothea, GUN levelled.  So far, he has avoided Nix's gaze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Butterfield and Swann are locked in a life-or-death strug They tumble back against the table upon which Nix was resurrected.  It collapses under them, and for a moment S is stunned.  Butterfield snatches up one of the instrumen and STABS at Swann, who rolls out of the way in the nick time.  The BLADE catches him in the arm, however.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go on, bleed. (he slashes at Swann

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: again) Go on!  Go on! Butterfield comes after him, and Swann backs off against wall.  He SPITS out a serpentine FLAME, which races acros the floor and leaps at Butterfield's face!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (screaming)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! He falls backwards, his face ON FIRE.  Swann doesn't wait watch him die, but races out into the passageway, BLOOD running from his wound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry is staring up at Dorothea as he very gingerly cross the still-sticky ground.  He's a yard from the edge of th pit now.  Nix swings round.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not Swann.  Who are you? (a beat) )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh... I know what you want. He lets Dorothea slip from his arms.   Harry flings himself towards the hole and CATCHES HOLD of Dorothea's arm before she falls away into the abyss.  His goes spinning across the ground, back towards the door leading to the passageway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh God!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hang on! Nix reaches down to torment Harry.  But before he can mak contact

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nix! Nix looks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There you are.  Suddenly, Nix isn't interested in Harry and Dorothea. He steps onto solid ground, and walks towards Swann, his ton suddenly conversational.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've had a lot of time to think about you.  Where I went wrong... With Nix's back turned, Harry pulls Dorothea back out of chasm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I should have been honest with you, right from the start.  I wasn't born to show people the error of their ways.  I was born to murder the world. ON HARRY, as he leads Dorothea to the door.  Harry glance back into the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You could still help me do that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why would I want to?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you've got nothing else to live for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The woman has a new love in her life.  Your friends are dead. Nobody's left to save you, but me He lays his hands on Swann.  Draws him into an embrace. ON HARRY and Dorothea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Dorothea)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got to help him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nix has got to have a weak spot.  Everybody's got a fucking weak spot. A NOISE. He turns, and suddenly -- Butterfield is there!  His face is horribly burned, but h still very much alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bastard! He launches himself at Harry, driving them both back into BROKEN GLASS.  A FIGHT ensues, carrying them out into the Passageway.  Nix has Swann in a bear-hug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you help me?  A beat.  Then Swann nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Nix lets him go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know I'll kill you when we're done.  I have to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But until then... it's you and me... the way it always was.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Dorothea, at the doorway, watches this bizarre exchange. Swann's eyes flicker towards her.  Nix turns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait... you still feel something for that bitch?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liar! Nix makes a gesture, and Swann is flung against the wall, pinned there like a fly, legs off the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will!  You!  Never!  Learn!? With each word, Nix almost casually throws a gesture in Swann's direction, and though there is six feet between t they have the force of terrible blows.  One to the ribs.  They CRACK.  One to the face.  It BLEEDS.  One to the leg one to the arms.  They all BREAK.  Then Nix turns towards Dorothea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's just flesh, Swannnie-boy. I'll show you! He moves towards Dorothea.  Swann falls to the ground, broken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fight between Butterfield and Harry continues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry!  Stop him! Harry looks up.  Sees Dorothea retreating from the door, running off into the darkness.  Butterfield comes at Harry again.  Harry's got no more ti for this creep.  He delivers Butterfield a backhand swipe and Butterfield lands face down in the glass.  We don't s the impact.  HEARING it's enough.  Harry looks down at the body.  Then --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is she?  Harry turns. Nix is on him like a luoaernaut. treading on Butterfield' body as he comes at Harry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did she go? Nix GRABS hold of Harry's head with one hand and PRESSES fingers of -the other hand against Harry's TEMPLES. He struggles to get free, but Nix is simply too powerful. Nix's fingers slowly SLIDE BENEATH the skin of Harry's temples.  As before, there's no blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've got Swann's disease. You think a little courage, a little love, and it'll all be all right.  Wrong! His fingers slide all the way in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh God! Harry wrests himself free of Nix, and stumbles away. His are BLOOD-RED.  Nix is a few yards behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me where she is... and I'll make it go away... Harry is reeling around in the grip of a nightmare. HARRY'S P.O.V. The apocalyptic images on the walls seem to move!  A face SCREAMS!  FIRE blossoms!  ON HARRY, verging on insanity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh God... oh God... HARRY'S P.O.V. Harry sees a WOMAN, wrapped in the sickly-sensual embrace some glistening, barely visible OBSCENITY.  We can't see face.  Only her mouth is visible in the coils of her devourer.

dialogues.speaker: ON HARRY
dialogues.text: as he approaches the wall, on which this woman is painted Reaching out for the image. HARRY'S P.O.V. The Woman reaches for Harry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help me.

dialogues.speaker: ON HARRY
dialogues.text: as he touches the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dorothea! He starts to SCRATCH out the plaster on which the image i painted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dorothea!  Dorothea! HARRY'S P.O.V. Darkness swallows the image of the woman.  She is still screaming when she disappears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON SWANN, dragging his broken body to the door.

dialogues.speaker: ON HARRY
dialogues.text: literally beating his head against the wall!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  No!  No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry... Harry stops.  Dare he believe this is truly her voice?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not real, Harry- Harry turns around.  Dorothea is there. HARRY'S P.O.V. For a moment, he sees Dorothea as she is. ON HARRY, relief flooding his face.  Then -- HARRY'S P.O.V. -- the image MORPHS.  Dorothea's beauty is replaced by primeval muck.  ON HARRY, appalled.  Dorothea grabs hold of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry.  Listen to me. Whatever's good between us, believe it. Harry's face is deathly white, and pouring SWEAT.  He's fighting the delirium.  Or doing his best.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm here, Harry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...yes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Nix steps from the shadows of the doorway behind Harry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Dorothea)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There you are, child.  Harry starts to look round.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I... have... to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, child.  I want Swann to see you die.  Harry turns and looks at Nix. HARRY'S P.O.V. Nix's face darkens as it MORPHS.  And the flesh in the mi of his brow UNFOLDS, revealing a dark, pulsating THIRD EY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Harry)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you looking at? ON DOROTHEA, who has gone to the door of the Meditation R and now slips inside.  ON HARRY, staring up at Nix. ON DOROTHEA, re-emerging from the Meditation Room.  In he hand, Harry's GUN.  Harry looks round at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (points to his brow)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There... there! ON NIX, as he looks up at Dorothea.  ON DOROTHEA, as she raises the GUN.  She FIRES.  The bullet STRIKES Nix's FOREHEAD.  He sinks to his knees BLOOD pouring down his face from the hole where his third used to be. ON HARRY, as Nix's mind-hold falters.  He leans against t wall, shaking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm okay.  I'm okay. Harry opens his eyes.  Looks up at her. HARRY'S P.O.V. The last of the MORPHING fades.  He sees Dorothea as she actually is.  Dorothea goes down to comfort him, and they embrace.  Suddenly, a ROAR from Nix.  They look towards him -- -- it isn't over.  One last, terrifying transformation is overtaking Nix as kneels in the GLASS.  His sallow flesh is running in STRE up his body towards the DARK HOLE in the middle of his forehead --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One... last... illusion... -- his humanity is disappearing, vanishing into the vorte the bullet wound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God. Harry and Dorothea start to get up...  Nix is no longer human.  He is a shape of gleaming DARKNE stripped of features.  He opens his mouth, the only visib element on his body is his toothed maw, which looses an utterly inhuman SHRIEK!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... D'Amour... Harry glances through the door into the Meditation Room. Swann is on the threshold.  Nix RISES now.  He is a terrifying spectacle, his bulk somehow more intimidating than ever in this simplified fo He comes at Dorothea, who has no choice but to back away the Meditation Room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pit still yawns in the middle of the floor. Dorothea backed towards it by Nix.  When Nix SPEAKS, his voice is not remotely human.  It is DEMONIACAL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am the purest of the pure.  I am the darkest of the dark... Harry is at the door now, starting towards Nix.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry.  You can't kill him.  Harry crouches beside Swann.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He did something with the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you do it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try. ON DOROTHEA.  She's a couple of yards from the pit now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm beyond Heaven.  I'm beyond Hell. Suddenly, Harry lunges at Nix, grabbing hold of his legs. Nix topples. ON SWANN, who puts his hands on the ground.  Closes his e A wave of LIQUIFICATION runs through the ground from Swan broken fingers --  -- the Cultists' bodies MOVE in the softening ground, lik corpses in surf, and ROLL towards the pit, their dead fac resurfacing -- Barbara's body floats past Nix, and disappears over the edge of the pit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Dorothea)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out of here! The ground is very liquid now, and the corpses are lodgin around Nix as they're all carried towards the pit.  So's Harry, of course.  Nix tries to get up, but he's too late.  The corpses weig him down, the ground is too fluid for him to get a proper hold, and Harry still clings to his legs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  No!  No! He's at the edge of the pit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry! Harry looks round.  Dorothea's behind him, risking the flowing ground to offer him a hand.  Nix starts to fall into the pit.  At the last minute, he reaches for Harry, as --  -- Harry is pulled out of reach bv Dorothea.  Together they stumble to THE DOOR, where Swann still lies They look back to see  NIX, as he goes over the edge of the pit and FALLS SCREAM At the door, Dorothea lifts up Swann's head.  He's dead. closes his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What we are about to witness is the longest fall-to-his- death by any villain in the history of cinema...  Nix is falling through rock.  Still SCREAMING.  He CRASHE against a layer of stone, which his body smashes to smithereens.  And as he falls --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it finished?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think so. No it's not.  Nix keeps falling, breaking through another layer of rock as he descends deeper and deeper into the earth.  And now... there's a hint of FIERY LIGHT below.  He's approaching MAGMA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on... She puts her arms around him.  Kisses him, sobbing with relief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nix hits a layer of molten rock, and, SCREAMING, he disappears.  A BURST of dark, roiling ENERGY erupts from spot where he sank, and starts up the pit --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The room TREMBLES.  There's a ROAR in the earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry-?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out!  Out!  They race for the front door --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- the wave of ENERGY, like a howling, dark WIND, ascends a breath-taking rate

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry and Dorothea race for the open air, as

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ENERGY ERUPTS from the pit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry and Dorothea stumble out, into the night --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ENERGY howls from room to room, ERODING the images of the walls, BLOWING out the doors, DESTROYING all the resurrection equipment in the Sanctum --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry and Dorothea stumble to the car.  They look back at house, as the cacophony of destruction dies down.  ON THE RIM OF THE SUN, as it peeps over the desert horizo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SUNLIGHT creeps through the rooms as the DUST settles

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hole in the floor CLOSES UP, and is SEALED... SILENCE reigns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry and Dorothea get into the car.  Harry glances back the house.  Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quietly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's finished.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE IDOLS and the FRONT DOOR, virtually destroyed by t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry's car speeds away, leaving a plume of dust as
